name: ANavModifierVolume
doc: Allows applying selected AreaClass to navmesh, using Volume's shape

bMaskFillCollisionUnderneathForNavmesh: Experimental: if set, the 2D space occupied by the volume box will ignore FillCollisionUnderneathForNavmesh
NavMeshResolution:
Experimental: When not set to None, the navmesh tiles touched by the navigation modifier volume will be built
using the highest resolution found.
